The example in the Developer's manual may be a little bit out of date. The
=
basic structure is though simple enough.

Just subclass Processor and overr=
ide the innerProcess method. It will be
invoked for each URL that passes th=
rough the processing chain. Use the
initialTask and finalTask methods to se=
t up and tear down the DB connection.


System.out.println() goes to the he=
ritrix_out_log file if you are running a
Heritrix deployment instance.

> -=
